ambitious.example: She has ambitious plans to start her own business.
ambitious.exampleCn: 她有雄心勃勃的计划要创办自己的公司。

meticulous.meaning: 一丝不苟的，极其仔细的
meticulous.example: He is meticulous about every detail in his work.
meticulous.exampleCn: 他对工作中的每一个细节都一丝不苟。

prestigious.example: She graduated from a prestigious university.
prestigious.exampleCn: 她毕业于一所享有盛誉的大学。

sophisticated.exampleCn: 这家公司使用精密的技术。

resilient.meaning: 有弹性的，能恢复的；坚韧的
resilient.example: Children are often more resilient than adults.
resilient.exampleCn: 孩子们往往比成年人更有韧性。

elaborate.example: They made elaborate preparations for the event.
elaborate.exampleCn: 他们为这次活动做了精心的准备。

abandon.root: a-(away) + bandon(控制) -> 放弃控制
abandon.example: He had to abandon his car in the snow.
abandon.exampleCn: 他不得不在雪地里弃车而走。

abbreviation.example: U.N. is an abbreviation for United Nations.

abdomen.root: abdo(隐藏) + -men -> 隐藏内脏的地方
abdomen.example: Exercises can help tone your abdomen.
abdomen.exampleCn: 运动可以帮助锻炼腹部肌肉。

abnormal.root: ab-(离开) + norm(标准) + -al -> 离经叛道
abnormal.example: The test results showed abnormal levels.
abnormal.exampleCn: 测试结果显示数值异常。

aboard.root: a-(在) + board(木板/甲板) -> 在甲板上
aboard.example: Welcome aboard this flight to London.
aboard.exampleCn: 欢迎搭乘飞往伦敦的航班。

aboriginal.root: ab-(从) + origin(起源) + -al -> 自始就在的
aboriginal.example: They study aboriginal art in Australia.
aboriginal.exampleCn: 他们在研究澳大利亚的土著艺术。

abortion.root: ab-(离去) + ort(出生) + -ion -> 停止出生
abortion.example: Abortion is a highly debated topic.
abortion.exampleCn: 堕胎是一个争议极大的话题。

abroad.root: a- + broad(宽阔) -> 去广阔天地
abroad.example: She decided to study abroad next year.

absent.root: ab-(离开) + sent(存在) -> 不在这里
absent.example: He was absent from the meeting yesterday.

absorb.root: ab-(加强) + sorb(吸) -> 全力吸入
absorb.example: Plants absorb nutrients from the soil.
absorb.exampleCn: 植物从土壤中吸收养分。

abstract.root: abs-(离去) + tract(拉) -> 抽出来出来的
abstract.example: The artist's style is very abstract.
abstract.exampleCn: 这位艺术家的风格非常抽象。

abuse.root: ab-(偏离) + use(使用) -> 错用
abuse.example: He was arrested for drug abuse.

academy.root: Academus(希腊英雄名，其园林为学院址)
academy.example: He was elected to the national academy.
academy.exampleCn: 他当选为国家科学院院士。

accelerate.example: The car can accelerate very quickly.

accent.root: ac-(向) + cent(唱) -> 说话的调子
accent.example: She speaks with a French accent.
accent.exampleCn: 她说起话来带着法国口音。

access.example: Students have access to the library.
access.exampleCn: 学生们有权使用图书馆。

accessory.example: The belt is a stylish accessory.
accessory.exampleCn: 这条腰带是个时尚的配饰。

accident.root: ac-(向) + cid(落) -> 掉下来的意外
accident.example: She was injured in a car accident.

accommodation.root: ac- + mod(模式/适应) -> 使居住适应
accommodation.example: Hotel accommodation is included in the price.
accommodation.exampleCn: 价格中包含酒店住宿费。

accompany.root: ac-(向) + company(伙伴) -> 做伙伴
accompany.example: I will accompany you to the station.

accomplish.exampleCn: 我们齐心协力能完成任何事。

accord.example: The results accord with our expectations.
accord.exampleCn: 结果与我们的预期一致。

account.example: I need to open a bank account.
account.exampleCn: 我需要开一个银行账户。

accredit.root: ac- + cred(信任) + -it -> 给予信任
accredit.example: The school is accredited by the state.
accredit.exampleCn: 这所学校是经州政府授权认可的。

accumulate.example: Dust began to accumulate on the shelf.

accurate.root: ac- + cur(注意/关心) -> 细心做的
accurate.exampleCn: 报告提供了准确的信息。

accuse.root: ac-(向) + cuse(理由/诉讼) -> 找理由诉讼
accuse.example: They accuse him of stealing the money.

accustom.root: ac- + custom(习俗/习惯) -> 变成习惯
accustom.example: It took time to accustom myself to the heat.
accustom.exampleCn: 我花了一段时间才适应高温。

achieve.example: You can achieve your goals with hard work.
achieve.exampleCn: 通过努力你可以实现目标。

acid.example: Lemon juice is a natural acid.

acquaintance.root: ac- + quaint(知道) -> 逐渐知道的人
acquaintance.example: She is an old acquaintance of mine.

acquire.root: ac- + quire(寻求) -> 寻求到手
acquire.example: He managed to acquire a new skill.
acquire.exampleCn: 他设法学会了一项新技能。

acquisition.example: The company made a new acquisition.
acquisition.exampleCn: 公司完成了一项新收购。

actress.example: She is a famous Hollywood actress.
actress.exampleCn: 她是一位著名的好莱坞女演员。

acupuncture.example: Acupuncture is an ancient Chinese therapy.
acupuncture.exampleCn: 针灸是一种古老的中国疗法。

acute.example: She has an acute sense of smell.

adapt.example: We must adapt to the changing climate.
adapt.exampleCn: 我们必须适应不断变化的气候。

add.example: Add some salt to the soup.

adequate.root: ad- + equ(平等) -> 达到平等/够了
adequate.example: The food supply is adequate for the winter.
adequate.exampleCn: 冬季的食物供应是充足的。

adjacent.root: ad-(向) + jac(躺) -> 躺在旁边
adjacent.example: The hotel is adjacent to the beach.

adjective.root: ad-(向) + ject(投掷) -> 扔在名词旁的

adjust.root: ad- + just(正确) -> 使其变正确
adjust.example: You can adjust the seat height.
adjust.exampleCn: 你可以调节座椅的高度。

administration.root: ad- + minister(服务) -> 履行管理职能
administration.example: She works in the school administration.
administration.exampleCn: 她在学校行政部门工作。

admire.root: ad- + mire(惊奇/看) -> 惊奇地看着
admire.exampleCn: 我真的很钦佩你的勇气。

admission.example: Admission to the museum is free.
admission.exampleCn: 参观这家博物馆是免费的。

admit.root: ad- + mit(送/放) -> 让其进来
admit.example: He refused to admit his mistake.
admit.exampleCn: 他拒绝承认自己的错误。

adolescence.example: Adolescence can be a difficult period.
adolescence.exampleCn: 青春期可能是一个艰难的时期。

adopt.root: ad-(向) + opt(选择) -> 通过选择接纳
adopt.example: They decided to adopt a child from the orphanage.
adopt.exampleCn: 他们决定从孤儿院收养一个孩子。

adorn.root: ad-(向) + orn(装饰) -> 增加装饰
adorn.exampleCn: 金戒指装饰着她的手指。

advance.root: ab-(离开) + ante(在前面) -> 走在前面
advance.example: Technology continues to advance at a rapid pace.
advance.exampleCn: 技术继续以飞快的速度向前发展。

adventure.root: ad-(向) + vent(来) -> 来到身边的奇事
adventure.example: The trip to the jungle was a great adventure.
adventure.exampleCn: 去丛林的旅行是一次伟大的冒险。

adverb.root: ad-(向) + verb(动词) -> 加在动词旁的词

adverse.root: ad-(向) + vers(转) -> 转向对立面的
adverse.example: The flight was delayed due to adverse weather.
adverse.exampleCn: 由于天气不利，航班延误了。

adversity.root: adverse(不利的) + -ity(性质) -> 困难局面
adversity.example: He showed great courage in the face of adversity.
adversity.exampleCn: 面对逆境，他表现出了巨大的勇气。

advertise.root: ad-(向) + vert(转) -> 让大家转过来看
advertise.example: The company needs to advertise its new products.
advertise.exampleCn: 公司需要为新产品做广告宣传。

advise.root: ad-(向) + vis(看) -> 让别人去看(注意)
advise.example: I would advise you to save your money.
advise.exampleCn: 我会建议你把钱存起来。

aesthetic.root: aesth(感觉) + -ic -> 关于感官美的
aesthetic.example: The building has a unique aesthetic appeal.
aesthetic.exampleCn: 这栋建筑具有独特的审美吸引力。

affair.root: af-(向) + fair(做) -> 要去做的事情
affair.example: The minister is busy with foreign affairs.

affect.root: af-(向) + fect(做) -> 对某人做出作用
affect.example: Lack of sleep will affect your performance.
affect.exampleCn: 缺乏睡眠会影响你的表现。

affection.root: af-(向) + fect(做) + -ion -> 触动内心的情愫
affection.example: He has a great affection for his grandmother.
affection.exampleCn: 他对他祖母有很深的感情。

affirm.root: af-(向) + firm(坚固) -> 使其确定
affirm.example: The witness affirmed that she had seen the man.
affirm.exampleCn: 证人确认她曾见过那个男人。

affluent.root: af-(向) + flu(流) -> 钱财如流水般涌入
affluent.example: They live in an affluent neighborhood.
affluent.exampleCn: 他们住在一个富裕的社区。

afford.root: af-(向) + forth(出) -> 能拿得出来
afford.example: I can't afford to buy a new car right now.
afford.exampleCn: 我现在的财力买不起新车。

african.example: The museum features an exhibition of African art.
african.exampleCn: 博物馆举办了一场非洲艺术展览。

agent.root: ag(做) + -ent(人) -> 替你做事的人
agent.example: Please contact my travel agent for tickets.
agent.exampleCn: 请联系我的旅行代理商买票。

aggravate.root: ag-(向) + grav(重) + -ate -> 使变得更沉重
aggravate.example: His comments only served to aggravate the situation.
aggravate.exampleCn: 他的评论只会使局势恶化。

aggressive.root: ag-(向) + gress(走) + -ive -> 向前冲的
aggressive.example: The company is very aggressive in seeking new markets.
aggressive.exampleCn: 这家公司在寻求新市场方面非常有进取心。

agony.root: agon(斗争) -> 像垂死挣扎般的痛苦
agony.example: He lay on the ground in agony after the fall.
agony.exampleCn: 摔倒后，他痛苦地躺在地上。

agreeable.root: agree(同意) + -able(能...的) -> 容易达成共识的
agreeable.example: We spent a very agreeable evening together.
agreeable.exampleCn: 我们一起度过了一个非常愉快的夜晚。

agreement.example: The two countries signed a trade agreement.
agreement.exampleCn: 两国签署了一项贸易协定。

agriculture.root: agri(田地) + cult(耕作) + -ure -> 耕种土地
agriculture.example: Most of the population is employed in agriculture.
agriculture.exampleCn: 大多数人口从事农业工作。

aid.example: The organization provides emergency aid to refugees.
aid.exampleCn: 该组织为难民提供紧急援助。

airline.example: Which airline are you flying with?
airline.exampleCn: 你搭乘哪家航空公司的飞机？

airplane.example: The airplane took off on time.

airtight.example: Store the cookies in an airtight container.
airtight.exampleCn: 将饼干存放在密封容器中。

aisle.root: ala(侧翼/翅膀) -> 侧边的走廊
aisle.example: Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat?
aisle.exampleCn: 你要靠窗的座位还是靠过道的座位？

alarm.root: al-(向) + arm(武器) -> 拿起武器(准备战斗)
alarm.example: The fire alarm went off in the middle of the night.

alcohol.root: 来自阿拉伯语 al-kuhl(精细粉末/精髓)
alcohol.example: Doctors advise against drinking too much alcohol.
alcohol.exampleCn: 医生建议不要过量饮酒。

alga.example: Alga is a simple plant that grows in water.
alga.exampleCn: 藻类是一种生长在水中的简单植物。

algebra.root: 来自阿拉伯语 al-jabr(整合/还原)
algebra.example: We are studying linear algebra this semester.
algebra.exampleCn: 这学期我们在学习线性代数。

alien.root: ali-(别的/其他的) + -en -> 其他地方的人
alien.example: The movie is about an alien from another planet.
alien.exampleCn: 这部电影是关于一个来自外星球的外星人。

allergy.root: all-(别的) + ergy(反应) -> 对别的东西产生反应
allergy.example: I have an allergy to cat fur.

alleviate.root: al-(向) + levi(轻) + -ate -> 使负担变轻
alleviate.example: The new medicine will help alleviate the pain.
alleviate.exampleCn: 这种新药将有助于缓解疼痛。

allocate.root: al-(向) + loc(地方) -> 放到指定地方
allocate.example: The government will allocate funds for education.

allow.root: al-(向) + locare(分配) -> 给予权利
allow.example: Pets are not allowed in the restaurant.
allow.exampleCn: 这家餐厅不允许宠物进入。

alloy.root: al-(向) + loy(绑定/结合) -> 结合在一起的金属
alloy.example: Steel is an alloy of iron and carbon.

allure.root: al-(向) + lure(引诱物) -> 引诱
allure.example: The allure of the big city was hard to resist.
allure.exampleCn: 大城市的吸引力难以抵挡。

alphabet.root: alpha(α) + beta(β) -> 希腊语前两个字母

alter.root: alter(其他的) -> 变成另一个样
alter.example: He had to alter his plans at the last minute.
alter.exampleCn: 他在最后一刻不得不改变计划。

alternate.root: alter(其他的) + -ate -> 换成另一个
alternate.example: The movie mixes comedy and drama in alternate scenes.
alternate.exampleCn: 电影在不同场景中交替穿插喜剧和戏剧。

altitude.example: The plane is flying at an altitude of 30,000 feet.
altitude.exampleCn: 飞机在3万英尺的高度飞行。

alumni.root: alere(滋养) -> 被母校滋养大的人
alumni.example: The university holds an event for alumni every year.
alumni.exampleCn: 这所大学每年都为校友举办活动。

amaze.root: a- + maze(迷宫) -> 像陷入迷宫般困惑惊奇
amaze.example: Your ability to speak five languages amazes me.
amaze.exampleCn: 你能说五种语言的能力让我大为惊叹。

amazing.example: The view from the top of the mountain is amazing.

ambassador.root: amb-(周围) + act(做) -> 四处奔波办事的人
ambassador.example: He was appointed as the British ambassador to France.
ambassador.exampleCn: 他被任命为英国驻法国大使。

ambiguous.root: ambi-(二/两边) + ig(驱动) -> 两边跑的
ambiguous.exampleCn: 这些说明有些模棱两可。

ambition.root: amb-(走动) -> 四处拉选票的野心
ambition.example: Her ambition is to become a world-class pianist.
ambition.exampleCn: 她的抱负是成为世界级的钢琴家。

ambulance.root: ambul(走) -> 走动的(野战)医院
ambulance.example: Call an ambulance! It's an emergency.
ambulance.exampleCn: 快叫救护车！有紧急情况。

amphibian.root: amphi-(两个) + bi(生活) -> 两种生活环境
amphibian.example: A frog is a well-known amphibian.
amphibian.exampleCn: 青蛙是一种众所周知的两栖动物。

amplify.example: Electric guitars need to amplify their sound.

amuse.root: a-(在) + muse(发呆/思考) -> 使人想入非非
amuse.example: His funny stories amused the whole group.
amuse.exampleCn: 他的搞笑故事逗乐了全组人。

analogy.root: ana-(根据) + logy(比例/言语) -> 比例一致
analogy.example: He drew an analogy between a brain and a computer.
analogy.exampleCn: 他把大脑和电脑做了一个类比。

analyse.root: ana-(分开) + lyse(松开) -> 解剖分析
analyse.example: Researchers need to analyse the test results.
analyse.exampleCn: 研究人员需要分析测试结果。

anatomy.root: ana-(分开) + tomy(切) -> 切开看构造
anatomy.example: The students are studying human anatomy.
anatomy.exampleCn: 学生们正在学习人体解剖学。

ancestor.root: an-(在先) + cest(走) -> 走在前面的人
ancestor.exampleCn: 他们的祖先来自苏格兰。

anchor.root: ank(弯曲) -> 钩子状的东西
anchor.example: The ship dropped anchor in the harbor.

anecdote.root: an-(不) + ec-(出) + dote(给) -> 不曾公开的小事
anecdote.example: She told an amusing anecdote about her cat.
anecdote.exampleCn: 她讲了一个关于她猫的趣闻。

anger.root: ang(狭窄/勒紧) -> 心里憋屈的怒火
anger.example: He couldn't hide his anger at the news.
anger.exampleCn: 听到这个消息，他掩饰不住愤怒。

angle.example: The two roads meet at a sharp angle.

animation.root: anim(生命) + -ation -> 赋予生命的东西
animation.example: The movie uses a mix of live action and animation.
animation.exampleCn: 这部电影结合了真人表演和动画。

ankle.example: She fell and twisted her ankle.

anniversary.root: anni(年) + vers(转) -> 每年转回来的日子
anniversary.example: Today is their tenth wedding anniversary.
anniversary.exampleCn: 今天是他们结婚十周年纪念日。

announce.root: an-(向) + nounce(说/报告) -> 向大众说明
announce.example: They will announce the winner tomorrow.
announce.exampleCn: 他们将于明天宣布获胜者。

announcer.example: The radio announcer has a very deep voice.
announcer.exampleCn: 那个电台播音员的声音很低沉。

annoy.root: in odium(令人厌恶) -> 引起反感
annoy.example: Mosquitoes always annoy me at night.

annual.example: The company holds an annual meeting in January.

anonymous.root: an-(无) + onym(名字) + -ous -> 没有名字的
anonymous.example: The donor wished to remain anonymous.

antarctic.example: The Antarctic ice is melting slowly.
antarctic.exampleCn: 南极的冰正在缓慢融化。

antenna.example: The TV antenna is on the roof.

anthropologist.exampleCn: 这位人类学家研究了古代部落。

antibiotic.root: anti-(抗) + bio(生命/生物) -> 杀菌物质
antibiotic.example: The doctor prescribed an antibiotic for the infection.
antibiotic.exampleCn: 医生给这处感染开了抗生素。

anticipate.root: anti-(提前) + cip(拿) + -ate -> 提前预料
anticipate.example: We anticipate a large crowd at the concert.
anticipate.exampleCn: 我们预期音乐会的人会很多。

antique.example: This desk is a valuable antique.
antique.exampleCn: 这张书桌是一件珍贵的古董。

antonym.root: ant-(相反) + onym(名字) -> 含义相反的词

anxiety.root: anx(勒紧/痛苦) + -iety -> 揪心的感觉
anxiety.example: Waiting for results can cause a lot of anxiety.
anxiety.exampleCn: 等待结果会引起极大的焦虑。

apartment.root: a- + part(部分) -> 楼房中的一部分
apartment.example: They live in a small apartment downtown.
apartment.exampleCn: 他们住在市中心的一套小公寓里。

apathetic.root: a-(无) + path(感情) -> 没有情感的
apathetic.example: Some students are apathetic about their grades.
apathetic.exampleCn: 有些学生对自己的成绩漠不关心。

apologize.root: apo-(脱离/辩解) + log(言语) -> 为自己辩解
apologize.example: You should apologize for being late.

apparatus.root: ad-(向) + parare(准备) -> 准备好的工具
apparatus.example: The scientists set up the laboratory apparatus.
apparatus.exampleCn: 科学家们架设好了实验室仪器。

appeal.root: ap-(向) + peal(驱动) -> 向外求助
appeal.example: The charity launched an appeal for donations.
appeal.exampleCn: 慈善机构发起了捐款呼吁。

appearance.example: Don't judge a person by their appearance.

appetiser.root: appet(胃口) + -iser -> 引起胃口的东西
appetiser.example: Would you like an appetiser before the main course?
appetiser.exampleCn: 主菜前要来份开胃菜吗？

appetite.root: ap-(向) + pet(追求/寻求) -> 追求食物
appetite.example: The walk has given me a good appetite.
appetite.exampleCn: 散步让我的胃口变好了。

applaud.root: ap-(向) + plaud(拍打) -> 对着拍手
applaud.example: The audience stood up to applaud the performance.

appliance.example: The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances.
appliance.exampleCn: 厨房配备了现代化的家电。

apply.root: ap-(向) + ply(折叠) -> 使其贴合
apply.example: She decided to apply for the job.

appointment.root: ap-(向) + point(指) + -ment -> 指出的时间/职位
appointment.example: I have a dentist appointment at 3 PM.

appreciate.root: ap-(向) + preci(价值) + -ate -> 给以价值
appreciate.example: I really appreciate all your help.
appreciate.exampleCn: 我真的很感激你所有的帮助。

apprentice.root: ap-(向) + prehend(抓住) -> 抓住机会学习的人
apprentice.example: He is working as an apprentice electrician.

approach.example: We need a new approach to solve this problem.
approach.exampleCn: 我们需要一种新方法来解决这个问题。

approximately.root: ap-(向) + proxim(接近) -> 接近于
approximately.example: The journey takes approximately two hours.
approximately.exampleCn: 旅程大约需要两个小时。

aptitude.root: apt(适应/合适) + -itude -> 天生合适的本领
aptitude.example: He has a natural aptitude for music.

arabian.example: The Arabian horse is famous for its beauty.
arabian.exampleCn: 阿拉伯马以其美丽而闻名。

arable.example: Only a small part of the country is arable.
arable.exampleCn: 这个国家只有一小部分土地适于耕种。

arbitrary.root: arbiter(法官/公断人) -> 法官主观决定的
arbitrary.example: The choice of winners seemed completely arbitrary.
arbitrary.exampleCn: 获胜者的选择似乎完全是随机的。

arch.example: The bridge is supported by a large stone arch.
arch.exampleCn: 大桥由一个巨大的石拱支撑。

barber.example: He went to the barber for a haircut.

bare.example: The trees are bare in winter.
bare.exampleCn: 冬天的树木是光秃秃的。

bark.root: 拟声词，模拟短促的叫声
bark.example: The dog began to bark at the stranger.
bark.exampleCn: 狗开始对着陌生人吠叫。

barn.root: bere(大麦) + ern(地方) -> 存粮处
barn.example: They stored the hay in the barn.
barn.exampleCn: 他们把干草存放在谷仓里。

barrel.root: bar(条/横木) -> 由木条箍成的桶
barrel.example: They kept the wine in an oak barrel.
barrel.exampleCn: 他们把酒存放在橡木桶里。

barren.example: The landscape was dry and barren.

barrier.example: Language is often a barrier to understanding.
barrier.exampleCn: 语言往往是理解的障碍。

basic.example: Food and water are basic human needs.
basic.exampleCn: 食物和水是人类的基本需求。

basin.root: bac(容器) -> 装水的圆器皿
basin.example: She filled the basin with warm water.

bat.root: 与beat同源 -> 用于击打的工具
bat.example: He hit the ball with a baseball bat.

bath.root: 来自古英语，指浸泡在水里
bath.example: I'm going to take a hot bath.

battery.root: batt(敲击) + -ery -> 一排炮/一组电池

battle.example: The soldiers prepared for the upcoming battle.
battle.exampleCn: 士兵们为即将到来的战斗做准备。

beach.root: 来自古英语，指卵石铺岸的地方
beach.example: We spent the afternoon on the beach.
beach.exampleCn: 我们在海滩上度过了下午。

bead.root: bed(祈祷) -> 祈祷时数的念珠
bead.example: She wore a necklace of glass beads.
bead.exampleCn: 她戴着一串玻璃珠项链。

beak.root: 来自拉丁语 beccus -> 尖锐的嘴
beak.example: The bird held a worm in its beak.

beam.root: 来自古英语，指木梁或光束
beam.example: A beam of sunlight shone through the window.
beam.exampleCn: 一束阳光从窗户射进来。

bean.root: 来自西日耳曼语，指种子的形状
bean.example: Coffee beans are ground into powder.

bear.root: bher(携带) -> 携带重担/生育
bear.example: He had to bear the responsibility alone.
bear.exampleCn: 他不得不独自承担责任。

beard.example: He decided to grow a thick beard.

beast.root: 来自拉丁语 bestia -> 动物
beast.example: The lion is known as the king of beasts.

beat.example: Our team beat them by two goals.
beat.exampleCn: 我们队以两球优势战胜了他们。

beef.root: 来自拉丁语 bos(公牛/牛)
beef.example: Would you like roast beef for dinner?

beggar.example: The beggar sat on the street corner.

behalf.root: be-(在) + half(一边) -> 站在一边
behalf.example: I'm speaking on behalf of my colleagues.
behalf.exampleCn: 我代表我的同事们发言。

behave.root: be-(使) + have(持有) -> 持守规范
behave.example: Please behave yourself during the party.

behaviour.example: His behaviour at school was excellent.
behaviour.exampleCn: 他在学校的表现非常好。

belief.root: be-(使) + lief(爱/信任) -> 深信不疑
belief.example: It is my belief that honesty is best.

bell.root: bhel(鸣响) -> 产生响声的物件
bell.example: The school bell rang at 8 o'clock.

belong.root: be-(使) + long(跟随) -> 随附于某人
belong.example: This book belongs to the library.

beloved.root: be-(被) + loved(爱) -> 深受爱戴的
beloved.example: The painting was of his beloved wife.
beloved.exampleCn: 那幅画画的是他深爱的妻子。

belt.root: 来自拉丁语 balteus -> 束腰带
belt.example: You should fasten your seat belt.

bench.root: 来自古英语，指长的木质座位
bench.example: They sat on a park bench for a while.
bench.exampleCn: 他们在公园长凳上坐了一会儿。

benchmark.root: bench(台) + mark(标记) -> 测量的刻度
benchmark.example: This test is the benchmark for quality.
benchmark.exampleCn: 这个测试是质量的基准。

bend.root: bhend(系/绑) -> 拉弓使之弯曲
bend.example: The road has many sharp bends.

benefit.root: bene(好) + fit(做) -> 做好事/好处
benefit.example: The new law will benefit many people.
benefit.exampleCn: 新法律将使许多人受益。

berry.root: 来自原始印欧语，指小的亮色果实
berry.example: Strawberries are a type of berry.

bet.root: 来自 abet(煽动) -> 确信而博弈
bet.example: I bet you won't finish that pizza.
bet.exampleCn: 我打赌你吃不完那个比萨。

betray.root: be-(加强) + tray(交付) -> 把机密交出
betray.example: She would never betray her friends.
betray.exampleCn: 她绝不会背叛她的朋友。

beverage.example: Tea and coffee are common beverages.
beverage.exampleCn: 茶和咖啡是常见的饮料。

bewilder.root: be-(使) + wilder(迷路) -> 使在荒野迷路
bewilder.example: The complex rules bewildered the new players.
bewilder.exampleCn: 复杂的规则让新玩家感到困惑。

bias.example: The report showed a bias towards the government.
bias.exampleCn: 报告显示出偏袒政府的倾向。

bible.example: He read the Bible every morning.

bibliography.root: biblio(书) + graphy(写) -> 书目的编写
bibliography.example: The student added a bibliography to her essay.
bibliography.exampleCn: 学生在论文末尾加了参考书目。

bid.root: 来自古英语，指命令或请求
bid.example: The highest bid for the car was $5,000.
bid.exampleCn: 这辆车的最高出价是5,000美元。

bilateral.example: The two countries signed a bilateral agreement.
bilateral.exampleCn: 两国签署了一项双边协议。

billiards.root: bill(木棒) + -iards -> 用棒玩的球类
billiards.example: He enjoys playing billiards at the weekend.

billion.root: bi-(二) + million -> 百万的二次方
billion.example: The population of China is over a billion.

binary.root: bin-(两个) + -ary -> 由两个组成的
binary.example: Computers process data in binary code.
binary.exampleCn: 计算机以二进制代码处理数据。

bind.example: Use a string to bind the old newspapers together.
bind.exampleCn: 用绳子把旧报纸捆在一起。

biography.root: bio(生命) + graphy(写) -> 书写生命历程
biography.example: I'm reading a biography of Steve Jobs.
biography.exampleCn: 我正在读史蒂夫·乔布斯的传记。

biologist.example: A marine biologist studies sea life.
biologist.exampleCn: 海洋生物学家研究海洋生物。

biology.root: bio(生命) + logy(学说) -> 生命科学
biology.example: She decided to major in biology.

biorhythm.example: Jet lag can disrupt your natural biorhythm.
biorhythm.exampleCn: 时差会扰乱你的自然生理节奏。

biscuit.root: bis-(两次) + cuit-(烤) -> 烤两次的硬面饼
biscuit.example: He had a biscuit with his tea.
biscuit.exampleCn: 他喝茶时吃了一块饼干。

bishop.root: epi-(在上面) + scop-(看) -> 监督者
bishop.example: The bishop led the church ceremony.

bite.root: 来自原始印欧语 bheid(劈开/切)

bitter.root: 来自bite -> 味道“咬”人的/辛辣的
bitter.example: The medicine had a bitter taste.

blade.root: 来自原始印欧语 bhel(开花/叶子)
blade.example: The razor has a very sharp blade.
blade.exampleCn: 这把剃须刀的刀刃非常锋利。

blame.root: 与blaspheme(亵渎)同源 -> 恶言相向
blame.example: They blame me for the accident.
blame.exampleCn: 他们把那次事故归咎于我。

blanket.example: It's cold; you need another blanket.
blanket.exampleCn: 天冷了；你还需要一条毯子。

blast.root: bhl-(吹) -> 一股强劲的气流
blast.exampleCn: 爆炸震碎了附近的窗户。

bleed.root: 来自 blood(血) 的动词形式
bleed.example: Your nose is starting to bleed.

blend.root: bhl-(混合/搅和) -> 使看不出界限
blend.example: Oil does not blend with water.

bless.root: blod(血) -> 以血涂祭坛使之神圣

blind.root: bhlend-(混淆) -> 视线不清/糊涂的
blind.example: The man has been blind since birth.
blind.exampleCn: 那个人生来就双目失明。

block.root: 来自古法语 bloc -> 沉重的木头
block.example: A fallen tree blocked the road.
block.exampleCn: 一棵倒下的树阻塞了道路。

bloom.example: The flowers will bloom in the spring.

blossom.example: The cherry trees are in full blossom.

blot.root: 来自斯堪的纳维亚语，指污渍
blot.example: He used a cloth to soak up the ink blot.

blow.root: bhl-(吹气) -> 空气流动的动作
blow.example: The wind began to blow strongly.

blueprint.root: blue(蓝) + print(印刷) -> 旧时施工图
blueprint.example: The engineers are reviewing the blueprint.
blueprint.exampleCn: 工程师们正在审查设计蓝图。

boast.root: 来自古法语 boster -> 鼓起来
boast.example: He likes to boast about his wealth.
boast.exampleCn: 他喜欢炫耀自己的财富。

bolt.root: 来自古英语，指沉重的箭头
bolt.example: He slid the bolt across the door.
bolt.exampleCn: 他把门上的插销插好了。

bomb.root: 拟声词，模拟爆炸的轰鸣声
bomb.example: The bomb exploded near the bridge.

bombard.exampleCn: 记者们连珠炮似地向他提问。

bond.root: 与bind同源 -> 结合在一起的东西
bond.example: The two brothers share a strong bond.
bond.exampleCn: 这两兄弟之间有着深厚的情谊。

bone.root: 来自西日耳曼语，指身体硬组织
bone.example: The dog is chewing a bone.

boot.root: 来自古法语 bote -> 护脚的皮套
boot.example: Put your luggage in the boot of the car.
boot.exampleCn: 把你的行李放在汽车后备箱里。

booth.root: 来自斯堪的纳维亚语，指临时居所
booth.example: I'll call you from a phone booth.
booth.exampleCn: 我会用公用电话亭给你打电话。

border.root: bord(边缘) -> 最外围的部分
border.example: They were stopped at the border.

bore.root: bher(穿透) -> 像钻孔般让人难受
bore.example: The long speech began to bore everyone.
bore.exampleCn: 漫长的演讲开始让每个人感到厌烦。

born.root: bear(携带/生育) 的过去分词
born.example: He was born in a small village.

boss.root: 来自荷兰语 baas -> 主人
boss.example: I need to talk to my boss.
boss.exampleCn: 我需要和我的老板谈谈。

botanist.example: The botanist discovered a new species of fern.
botanist.exampleCn: 这位植物学家发现了一种新的蕨类植物。

botany.example: He has a great interest in botany.
botany.exampleCn: 他对植物学有浓厚的兴趣。

bother.root: 来自盎格鲁-爱尔兰语，指噪音/烦扰

bough.root: bhugh(弯曲) -> 树木弯曲的分支
bough.example: The bough was heavy with fruit.

bounce.root: 拟声词，指砰的一声撞上并弹开
bounce.example: The ball bounced twice before he caught it.

bound.example: You are bound to fail if you don't study.
bound.exampleCn: 如果你不学习，注定会失败。

boundary.example: The river forms the boundary between the two states.
boundary.exampleCn: 这条河构成了两州之间的边界。

bowl.example: Would you like a bowl of soup?

boycott.root: 来自19世纪爱尔兰的一名经理人姓氏
boycott.example: They decided to boycott the company's products.
boycott.exampleCn: 他们决定抵制该公司的产品。

bracelet.example: She received a gold bracelet for her birthday.
bracelet.exampleCn: 她收到了一个金手镯作为生日礼物。

brain.root: 来自原始印欧语，指头部组织
brain.example: The brain is the control center of the body.
brain.exampleCn: 大脑是身体的控制中心。

brainstorm.root: brain(大脑) + storm(风暴) -> 头脑风暴
brainstorm.example: Let's brainstorm some ideas for the project.
brainstorm.exampleCn: 让我们为这个项目集思广益一些主意。

brake.root: 与break同源 -> 阻断运动的装置
brake.example: He applied the brake to stop the car.

casualty.example: Road accidents cause many casualties every year.
casualty.exampleCn: 道路交通事故每年造成许多人员伤亡。

cataclysmic.root: cata(下) + klyzein(洗) -> 大洪水冲毁一切
cataclysmic.example: The country suffered a cataclysmic earthquake.
cataclysmic.exampleCn: 这个国家遭受了一场灾难性的地震。

catalogue.root: cata(完全) + log(记录) -> 全部的记录
catalogue.example: I found this shirt in the autumn catalogue.
catalogue.exampleCn: 我在秋季目录中找到了这件衬衫。

catalyst.root: cata(下) + lyst(解开) -> 解开束缚促进反应
catalyst.example: The new law was a catalyst for social change.
catalyst.exampleCn: 新法律是社会变革的催化剂。

catastrophe.root: cata(下) + strophe(转) -> 天旋地转的灾难
catastrophe.example: The flood was a major environmental catastrophe.
catastrophe.exampleCn: 这次洪水是一场重大的环境灾难。

catastrophic.example: The failure of the dam had catastrophic effects.
catastrophic.exampleCn: 水坝的决堤产生了灾难性的后果。

catch.root: 来自cap(抓)的变体 -> 伸出手抓住
catch.example: Try to catch the ball with both hands.

category.root: cata(下) + agor(公开说) -> 宣布归入某类
category.example: The items are listed by category.
category.exampleCn: 这些物品是按类别列出的。

cater.root: cat(买) + -er -> 采购并提供饮食者
cater.example: The hotel caters for weddings and parties.
cater.exampleCn: 该饭店承办婚礼和聚会。

cathedral.root: cath(下) + edra(座位) -> 有主教座位的教堂
cathedral.example: The city is famous for its Gothic cathedral.
cathedral.exampleCn: 这座城市因其哥特式大教堂而闻名。

cattle.root: 与capital(资产)同源 -> 原始的财富
cattle.example: The farmer raised a large herd of cattle.
cattle.exampleCn: 那个农民养了一大群牛。

cause.root: caus(理由/原因) -> 做事背后的推力
cause.example: The heavy rain was the cause of the flood.
cause.exampleCn: 大雨是洪水发生的原因。

cave.root: cav(空) -> 山体中空的地方
cave.example: They took shelter in a dark cave.
cave.exampleCn: 他们在黑暗的洞穴里避难。

cease.root: cess(走/撤) -> 往后退不再进行
cease.example: The rain had ceased by the morning.

ceiling.root: cael(天) + -ing -> 房间里的“顶天”处
ceiling.example: A large chandelier hung from the ceiling.
ceiling.exampleCn: 天花板上挂着一盏大吊灯。

celebrate.root: celebr(聚集) + -ate -> 大家聚在一起欢庆
celebrate.example: We held a party to celebrate his success.
celebrate.exampleCn: 我们开了一个聚会来庆祝他的成功。

celebrity.example: She became a global celebrity overnight.
celebrity.exampleCn: 她一夜之间成为了全球名人。

cell.root: cel(隐藏) -> 封闭的小空间
cell.example: The human body is made of millions of cells.
cell.exampleCn: 人体由数百万个细胞组成。

cellar.root: cel(隐藏) + -ar -> 地下隐藏物品处
cellar.example: They keep their wine in the cellar.
cellar.exampleCn: 他们把酒存放在地窖里。

cello.example: He has been playing the cello since childhood.

celsius.root: 源自摄氏温标发明者 A. Celsius
celsius.example: Water freezes at zero degrees Celsius.

cement.root: caedere(砍) -> 原指用于建筑的碎石
cement.example: The bricks were held together by cement.

century.example: We are living in the twenty-first century.

ceramic.example: This vase is a beautiful piece of ceramic.
ceramic.exampleCn: 这个花瓶是一件精美的陶瓷制品。

ceremony.example: The wedding ceremony was very touching.

certify.root: cert(确定) + -ify(使) -> 使其正式确定
certify.example: He was certified as a qualified doctor.
certify.exampleCn: 他被证明是一名合格的医生。

chain.root: catena(链) -> 环环相扣的东西
chain.example: He owns a chain of fast-food restaurants.
chain.exampleCn: 他拥有一家快餐连锁店。

challenge.root: calumnia(诬告) -> 引申为挑衅和挑战
challenge.example: Climbing the mountain was a huge challenge.
challenge.exampleCn: 爬这座山是一个巨大的挑战。

chamber.root: camara(拱顶室) -> 私密的室内空间

champion.root: camp(战场) + -ion -> 战场上的优胜者
champion.example: He is the world champion in chess.
champion.exampleCn: 他是国际象棋的世界冠军。

chance.example: Please give me a chance to explain.
chance.exampleCn: 请给我一个解释的机会。

chancellor.root: cancelli(格栅) -> 格栅后办事的官
chancellor.example: The Chancellor is meeting with other leaders.
chancellor.exampleCn: 总理正在与其他领导人会面。

change.root: camb(换/弯) -> 调换位置或状态
change.example: You need to change your wet clothes.

channel.root: can(管/沟) -> 引导流动的路径
channel.example: Please change the channel on the TV.

chapter.root: capt(头) -> 书的每一“头”或部分
chapter.example: I've just finished the first chapter.

character.root: charac(刻) -> 刻画出来的独特特征
character.example: He is a man of strong character.
character.exampleCn: 他是一个性格坚强的人。

charcoal.example: We used charcoal to start the barbecue.
charcoal.exampleCn: 我们用木炭来生火烧烤。

charming.root: charm(咒语) + -ing -> 像被施咒般吸引人
charming.example: The village is small but very charming.
charming.exampleCn: 这个村庄虽小但非常迷人。

chart.example: The chart shows the sales growth.
chart.exampleCn: 图表显示了销售增长情况。

charter.root: chart(纸) + -er -> 正式的契约文本
charter.example: The company decided to charter a plane.

chase.root: cap(抓)的变体 -> 跑去抓住某物
chase.example: The cat likes to chase mice.

cheap.root: ceap(买卖/市场) -> 市场上的低价

cheat.root: escheat(充公)的缩略 -> 变相抢夺
cheat.example: He was caught trying to cheat in the exam.
cheat.exampleCn: 他考试作弊被当场抓获。

check.root: 原指象棋中的“将军” -> 遏制与核实
check.example: Please check your work for mistakes.
check.exampleCn: 请检查你的作业是否有错。

checklist.example: Check each item off the checklist.

cheek.root: 来自古英语cece -> 脸的两侧
cheek.example: She kissed him on the cheek.
cheek.exampleCn: 她在他的面颊上吻了一下。

cheer.example: The crowd began to cheer loudly.

cheese.example: I love adding cheese to my pasta.
cheese.exampleCn: 我喜欢在意大利面里加奶酪。

chemistry.exampleCn: 化学是一门很难的学科。

cheque.root: 与check(核对)同源 -> 核对单据
cheque.example: I wrote a cheque for the rent.
cheque.exampleCn: 我开了一张支票付房租。

cherry.root: kerasos(樱桃) -> 红色的小浆果

chess.example: My grandfather taught me how to play chess.
chess.exampleCn: 我爷爷教我下国际象棋。

chest.root: cista(盒子) -> 存放器官的盒子
chest.example: He felt a sharp pain in his chest.

chew.root: 拟声词 -> 模拟牙齿摩擦的声音
chew.example: You should chew your food thoroughly.

chicken.example: We had fried chicken for lunch.

chief.example: The chief reason for the delay was rain.
chief.exampleCn: 延误的主要原因是下雨。

childish.exampleCn: 别再说这些幼稚的话了。

chill.root: 与cold同源 -> 指刺骨的寒意
chill.example: There's a slight chill in the air.

chimney.root: camin(炉灶) -> 炉灶的排烟道
chimney.example: Smoke rose from the factory chimney.
chimney.exampleCn: 烟从工厂的烟囱里升起。

chin.root: 来自古英语 cin -> 脸的底部

chocolate.example: She gave me a box of chocolates.

choir.example: He sings in the school choir.

choke.root: 拟声词 -> 模拟卡住脖子的声音

choose.root: 来自古英语 ceosan -> 辨别并拿走

choose.exampleCn: 他花了很长时间才选好礼物。

chop.root: 拟声词 -> 模仿斧头劈砍的声音
chop.example: Can you help me chop the onions?
chop.exampleCn: 你能帮我剁碎这些洋葱吗？

chore.root: char(一段时间) -> 日复一日的工作

chronology.exampleCn: 我正在寻找这场战争的年表。

chunk.root: 来自chump的变体 -> 厚实的一块

cigarette.example: He lit a cigarette and sat down.
cigarette.exampleCn: 他点了一支烟坐了下来。

circle.example: The children sat in a circle.

circuit.root: circ(圆) + it(走) -> 绕圈子走

circulate.root: circ(圆) + -ulate(动词) -> 像圆环一样转

circumstance.root: circum(周围) + st(站) -> 站在周围的事

circumstance.exampleCn: 在任何情况下你都不该开门。

circus.root: circ(圆) -> 在圆形场地表演

cite.root: cit(召唤/驱动) -> 唤出证据

citizen.root: city(城市) + -zen(人) -> 城市里的人

civil.root: civ(公民) -> 公民应具备的素质

claim.example: She claimed that she had lost her keys.
claim.exampleCn: 她声称自己弄丢了钥匙。

clan.root: plant(后代) -> 繁衍出的族群

clan.exampleCn: 整个家族聚在一起参加婚礼。

clap.root: 拟声词 -> 模仿手掌撞击声

clarify.root: clar(清楚) + -ify(使) -> 使事情变清楚

classical.root: class(等级/最高级) -> 最高等级的艺术

clause.root: claud(关闭/限制) -> 被限制的语句

clay.root: 与glue同源 -> 具有粘性的土

clear.example: The water in the lake is very clear.

clerk.root: cleric(教士) -> 早期识字办事的教士
clerk.example: The bank clerk helped me with the deposit.
clerk.exampleCn: 银行职员帮我办理了存款。

clever.root: 来自古英语 -> 动作灵巧的

client.root: clin(倾斜) -> 依附/听从专家的人

cliff.root: 来自古英语 clif -> 陡峭的岸

climate.root: clim(倾斜) -> 太阳光线的倾斜度

climate.exampleCn: 他们要搬到气候更温暖的地方。

climb.root: 来自古英语 climban -> 紧抓向上

climb.exampleCn: 他们花了三个小时爬上那座山。

contemplate.root: con-(加强) + templ(观察处) -> 凝视思索

contemplate.exampleCn: 她坐在湖边沉思她的未来。

contempt.root: con-(加强) + tempt(蔑视) -> 极端看不起

contempt.exampleCn: 他对比那些警告不屑一顾。

contend.root: con-(一起) + tend(伸展) -> 互相伸长争抢

contend.exampleCn: 救援队不得不与恶劣天气作斗争。

contention.exampleCn: 这个问题是争论的根源。

contest.root: con-(一起) + test(证据) -> 共同作证/比试

context.root: con-(一起) + text(编织) -> 编织在一起的环境

continent.root: con-(一起) + tin(拿) -> 连在一起的土地

continent.exampleCn: 亚洲是世界上最大的洲。

contingency.root: con-(一起) + ting(接触/发生) -> 随之发生的
contingency.example: We must make a contingency plan.

contradict.root: contra-(相反) + dict(说) -> 说话相反

contrast.root: contra-(相反) + st(站) -> 站在对面比拟
contrast.example: Her black dress stood out in contrast with the snow.

contribute.root: con-(一起) + tribut(给予) -> 共同给予

controversial.root: contro-(相反) + vers(转) -> 转向相反意见

controversy.example: The decision caused a lot of controversy.
controversy.exampleCn: 这个决定引起了很大争议。

convention.root: con-(一起) + vent(来) -> 大家来到一起
convention.example: Shaking hands is a social convention.

convert.root: con-(完全) + vert(转) -> 完全转变方向
convert.example: We converted the attic into a bedroom.
convert.exampleCn: 我们将阁楼改造成了卧室。

convey.root: con-(一起) + vey(道路) -> 沿路护送

convict.root: con-(加强) + vict(征服/胜利) -> 在法律上征服

convince.root: con-(加强) + vinc(征服) -> 说服即征服思想

cook.root: 来自拉丁语 coquus -> 烹调

cook.exampleCn: 我妈妈是个出色的厨师。

cooperate.root: co-(一起) + oper(工作) + -ate -> 一起工作

coordinate.root: co-(一起) + ordin(顺序) -> 放在同一序列

coordinate.exampleCn: 我们需要协调我们的努力。

cope.root: 来自古法语 couper -> 击/砍 -> 搏斗/应付

cope.exampleCn: 很难应付繁忙的日程安排。

copper.root: 来自 Cyprus (塞浦路斯，古代产铜地)

copy.example: Please make a copy of this document.

copyright.example: The book is protected by copyright.

cord.root: 来自希腊语 khorde -> 肠弦/绳索
cord.example: He tied the box with a piece of cord.
cord.exampleCn: 他用一根绳子把盒子捆了起来。

core.root: cor(心) -> 像心脏一样的中心
core.example: The earth has a metal core.

corn.root: 来自印欧语 gran -> 颗粒/种子

corpus.root: corp(身体) -> 文字的集合实体
corpus.example: The linguistic analysis used a large corpus.
corpus.exampleCn: 语言学分析使用了一个庞大的语料库。

correct.root: cor-(加强) + rect(直) -> 变直/纠正

correspond.root: cor-(一起) + re-(回) + spond(承诺) -> 互相回应

corridor.root: corr(奔跑) + -idor -> 跑动经过的地方

cosmetics.root: cosm(秩序/装饰) -> 整理仪容之物
cosmetics.example: She spent a lot of money on cosmetics.
cosmetics.exampleCn: 她在化妆品上花了很多钱。

cost.root: co-(一起) + st(站) -> 评估物品的地位

cost.exampleCn: 这里的成活成本是多少？

costume.root: 来自 custom(习俗) -> 不同风俗的服饰

cottage.example: They lived in a small cottage.
cottage.exampleCn: 他们住在一个小农舍里。

cotton.example: This shirt is made of pure cotton.

council.root: con-(一起) + cil(召唤) -> 召唤在一起讨论
council.example: He was elected to the city council.

counsellor.example: You should talk to a student counsellor.
counsellor.exampleCn: 你应该找学生辅导员谈谈。

count.example: Wait while I count the money.

counter.example: The clerk stood behind the counter.

counterbalance.example: The weight acting to counterbalance the crane.
counterbalance.exampleCn: 用来平衡起重机的重量。

counterfeit.root: counter-(相反) + feit(做) -> 逆向仿造

couple.root: cop(连接/抓) -> 连在一起的两个

coupon.root: coup(切) -> 从整页切下的纸条
coupon.example: He used a coupon to get a discount.
coupon.exampleCn: 他使用优惠券获得了折扣。

course.example: She took a course in photography.

court.root: cohort(院子) -> 聚在一起的院落

courtship.example: The long courtship ended in marriage.
courtship.exampleCn: 长久的求爱最终以婚姻告终。

cousin.root: 来自拉丁语 consobrinus -> 同母姊妹的孩子

cover.root: 来自古法语 covrir -> 覆盖

coward.root: cow(尾巴) + -ard -> 夹着尾巴逃跑的人

coward.exampleCn: 一碰到打针我就成了彻头彻尾的懦夫。

crack.root: 拟声词，模仿爆裂的声音

cradle.root: 来自古英语 cradel -> 摇晃的篮子

craftsman.example: The cabinet was made by a skilled craftsman.

cram.root: 来自古英语 crammian -> 填满

crane.exampleCn: 巨大的起重机吊起了集装箱。

crash.example: He escaped unhurt from the plane crash.
crash.exampleCn: 他在飞机失事中没受伤。

crater.root: 来自希腊语 krater -> 调酒用的大碗

crater.exampleCn: 月球表面布满了环形山。

crawl.root: 来自古挪威语 krafla -> 用手抓爬

crazy.root: craz(破碎) -> 精神破碎的/不正常

crazy.exampleCn: 在这种暴风雨中出去你疯了。

cream.root: 来自希腊语 khrisma -> 涂油/膏

cream.exampleCn: 我想在咖啡里加点奶油。

creature.root: crea(创造) + -ture -> 被创造出来的物

creature.exampleCn: 大海里充满了奇怪的生物。

credit.example: She has a good credit rating.

creep.root: 来自古英语 creopan -> 匍匐前进
creep.example: The cat tried to creep up on the bird.
creep.exampleCn: 猫试图悄悄接近那只鸟。

crew.root: cresc(增长) -> 增加的人力/援兵

cricket.root: 拟声词(蟋蟀叫)；或来自杆/棒

crime.root: 来自拉丁语 crimen -> 指控/判决

cripple.root: 来自 creep(爬) -> 只能爬行的人
cripple.example: The disease can cripple its victims.
cripple.exampleCn: 这种疾病会使患者致残。

crisis.root: cri(判断/区分) -> 需要判断的关头
crisis.example: The country is facing an economic crisis.
crisis.exampleCn: 这个国家正面临经济危机。

criteria.example: What are the criteria for success?

critic.root: crit(判断) + -ic -> 进行判断的人
critic.example: The film critic gave it a bad review.
critic.exampleCn: 影评人给了这部电影一个差评。

crop.root: 来自古英语 -> 顶端/聚集
crop.example: Rice is the main crop here.
crop.exampleCn: 水稻是这里的主要作物。

cross.example: Be careful when you cross the road.

crow.example: A crow sat on the fence.

crowd.root: 来自古英语 crudan -> 挤压

crown.root: 来自希腊语 korone -> 弯曲物/花环
crown.example: The queen wore a diamond crown.
crown.exampleCn: 女王戴着镶有钻石的皇冠。

crude.root: crud(生/冷) -> 没加工过的/生的

cruel.example: It is cruel to hunt animals for sport.
cruel.exampleCn: 为了运动而猎杀动物是残忍的。

cruise.example: We went on a Mediterranean cruise.
cruise.exampleCn: 我们去地中海乘船旅游了。

crush.root: 来自古法语 cruissir -> 撞击声/碎裂
crush.example: The machine is used to crush stones.
crush.exampleCn: 这台机器是用来粉碎石头的。

crust.root: 来自拉丁语 crusta -> 壳
crust.example: The earth's crust is very thin.

crystal.root: 来自希腊语 kryos -> 冰/透明的结冰物
crystal.example: The water was clear as crystal.

cub.example: The lioness was with her cubs.

cube.root: 来自希腊语 kybos -> 骰子/方体
cube.example: Ice cubes were floating in the glass.

deploy.root: de-(不) + ploy(折叠) -> 展开/部署
deploy.example: The company decided to deploy new software.

deposit.root: de-(下) + posit(放) -> 放下/存入

depression.example: The country fell into a deep economic depression.
depression.exampleCn: 该国陷入了严重的经济萧条。

deprive.root: de-(加强) + prive(私有的) -> 夺走私产
deprive.example: You shouldn't deprive yourself of sleep.
deprive.exampleCn: 你不应该剥夺自己的睡眠时间。

deputy.root: de-(由) + put(考虑/计数) -> 代理执行者

derive.root: de-(从) + riv(溪流) -> 从源头流出
derive.example: Many English words derive from Latin.
derive.exampleCn: 许多英语单词源于拉丁语。

descend.root: de-(向地) + scend(爬) -> 向下爬
descend.example: We watched the plane descend to the runway.
descend.exampleCn: 我们看着飞机降落在跑道上。

descendant.example: He is a direct descendant of the king.

describe.root: de-(下) + scribe(写) -> 写下来/记录
describe.example: Can you describe the man you saw?
describe.exampleCn: 你能描述一下你看到的那个男人吗？

desert.root: de-(不) + sert(连接) -> 无人居住处
desert.example: They were lost in the desert for two days.
desert.exampleCn: 他们在沙漠里迷路了两天。

deserve.root: de-(完全) + serve(服务) -> 尽职应得
deserve.example: You deserve a reward for your hard work.

design.root: de-(出) + sign(标记) -> 画出草图
design.example: The architect will design the new office.
design.exampleCn: 建筑师将设计新的办公室。

designate.example: This area is designated for non-smokers.
designate.exampleCn: 该区域被指定为非吸烟区。

desirable.example: A good education is highly desirable.
desirable.exampleCn: 良好的教育是非常令人向往的。

desire.root: de-(自) + sid(星星) -> 向星星祈愿
desire.example: She has a strong desire to travel.

desolate.root: de-(加强) + sol(孤独) + -ate -> 孤零零的
desolate.example: The landscape was desolate and empty.

despair.root: de-(无) + spair(希望) -> 没有希望
despair.example: He was in despair after losing his job.
despair.exampleCn: 失去工作后他陷入了绝望。

despatch.root: de-(离开) + spatch(束缚) -> 解开并派出
despatch.example: The goods will be despatched tomorrow.

desperate.root: de-(无) + sper(希望) + -ate -> 不顾一切
desperate.example: They made a desperate attempt to escape.
desperate.exampleCn: 他们为了逃跑做出了拼命的尝试。

destination.root: de-(加强) + stin(站立/决定) -> 终点
destination.exampleCn: 我们终于到达了目的地。

destitute.root: de-(远离) + stit(站立) -> 无立足之地
destitute.example: The war left many people destitute.
destitute.exampleCn: 战争让许多人流离失所，一贫如洗。

destruct.root: de-(不) + struct(建筑) -> 反向建筑
destruct.example: The missile has a self-destruct mechanism.

destructive.exampleCn: 暴风雨可能极具破坏性。

detach.root: de-(不) + tach(连接/钉住) -> 拆开
detach.example: Please detach the coupon from the box.
detach.exampleCn: 请将优惠券从盒子上撕下来。

detail.root: de-(加强) + tail(切) -> 切细的分支
detail.example: He explained the plan in great detail.

detect.root: de-(除去) + tect(盖子) -> 揭开盖子
detect.example: The sensor can detect small leaks.
detect.exampleCn: 传感器可以探测到微小的泄漏。

deter.root: de-(下) + ter(害怕) -> 吓得停下来
deter.example: The high price will deter many buyers.
deter.exampleCn: 高昂的价格会阻止许多买家。

detergent.root: de-(除去) + terg(擦) + -ent -> 洗涤物
detergent.example: Add some detergent to the washing machine.
detergent.exampleCn: 往洗衣机里加点洗涤剂。

deteriorate.example: His health began to deteriorate rapidly.
deteriorate.exampleCn: 他的健康状况开始迅速恶化。

determine.root: de-(加强) + termin(界限) -> 定下边界
determine.example: We must determine the cause of the fire.
determine.exampleCn: 我们必须确定火灾的原因。

detriment.root: de-(走) + tri(磨损) -> 磨损造成的损害
detriment.example: Smoking is a detriment to your health.

devastate.root: de-(加强) + vast(荒废) + -ate -> 使荒废

develop.root: de-(不) + velop(包裹) -> 打开包裹/展现
develop.example: They want to develop new products.

deviate.root: de-(离) + via(道路) -> 离开道路
deviate.example: Do not deviate from the original plan.

device.root: de-(加强) + vid(看/分) -> 专门设计的工具
device.example: This device saves a lot of energy.
device.exampleCn: 这个装置节省了很多能源。

devil.root: dia-(穿过) + bol(抛) -> 诽谤者
devil.example: Don't be a devil; help me out!

devise.root: de-(加强) + vis(看/分) -> 筹划
devise.example: They devised a new method for recycling.
devise.exampleCn: 他们设计了一种新的回收方法。

devote.root: de-(加强) + vote(发誓) -> 誓言献身
devote.example: She devoted her life to charity.
devote.exampleCn: 她的一生都致力于慈善事业。

devour.root: de-(完全) + vour(吞食) -> 吞吃干净
devour.example: He began to devour the delicious food.
devour.exampleCn: 他开始狼吞虎咽地吃美味的食物。

dew.example: The grass was wet with morning dew.
dew.exampleCn: 草地被早晨的露水弄湿了。

diabetes.root: dia-(穿过) + betes(走) -> 多尿/虹吸
diabetes.example: My grandfather has been diagnosed with diabetes.
diabetes.exampleCn: 我的祖父被诊断出患有糖尿病。

diagnose.root: dia-(通过) + gnose(知道) -> 彻底了解
diagnose.example: Doctors were able to diagnose the illness.
diagnose.exampleCn: 医生们能够诊断出这种病。

diagonal.root: dia-(穿过) + gon(角) -> 穿过角
diagonal.example: Draw a diagonal line across the paper.

diagram.root: dia-(通过) + gram(写/画) -> 绘出的图
diagram.example: Please refer to the diagram on page 10.

dial.root: di-(日) -> 太阳钟/日晷刻度面
dial.example: Dial 911 in case of an emergency.

dialect.root: dia-(在之间) + lect(谈) -> 不同区域间谈话
dialect.example: She speaks a local dialect of Italian.
dialect.exampleCn: 她说意大利的一种地方方言。

diameter.root: dia-(穿过) + meter(测量) -> 穿心测量
diameter.example: The diameter of the circle is 10cm.

diamond.root: a-(无) + damant(驯服) -> 无可征服/坚硬
diamond.example: The ring was set with a large diamond.
diamond.exampleCn: 戒指上镶嵌着一颗大钻石。

diary.example: I keep a diary of my travels.
diary.exampleCn: 我写日记记录我的旅行。

dictate.example: The teacher will dictate the sentences.

dictionary.root: dict(说) + -ionary -> 收录说出词语处
dictionary.example: Look up the word in the dictionary.

diet.root: 来自希腊语 diaita (生活方式)
diet.example: A healthy diet is essential for life.
diet.exampleCn: 健康的饮食对生活至关重要。

differ.root: dif-(离) + fer(带) -> 带离/不一致
differ.exampleCn: 他们的口味和我的不同。

differentiate.example: Can you differentiate between the two colors?
differentiate.exampleCn: 你能区分这两种颜色吗？

digest.root: di-(分) + gest(带) -> 把食物分开带走
digest.example: The body needs time to digest food.
digest.exampleCn: 身体需要时间来消化食物。

digital.example: We live in a digital age.

dilemma.root: di-(两) + lemma(假设) -> 两难处境
dilemma.example: I am facing a difficult dilemma.
dilemma.exampleCn: 我正面临一个艰难的抉择。

diligent.root: di-(选) + leg(挑) -> 挑出来做/精选
diligent.example: He is a diligent and hard-working student.
diligent.exampleCn: 他是一个勤奋好学的学生。

dilute.example: Dilute the juice with some water.

dimension.root: di-(离) + mens(测量) -> 测量出的长度

diminish.root: di-(加强) + min(小) -> 使变小
diminish.example: The pain will diminish over time.
diminish.exampleCn: 疼痛会随着时间的推移而减轻。

dining.example: The hotel has a large dining room.

dioxide.example: Carbon dioxide is a greenhouse gas.
dioxide.exampleCn: 二氧化碳是一种温室气体。

dip.root: 来自原始日耳曼语, 指沉入
dip.example: She took a dip in the ocean.

diploma.example: He received his high school diploma.
diploma.exampleCn: 他拿到了高中毕业证书。

diplomat.example: The diplomat negotiated a peace treaty.
diplomat.exampleCn: 这位外交官谈成了一个和平条约。

direct.root: di-(加强) + rect(直) -> 一直到底

dirt.root: 来自古诺斯语 drit (粪便)
dirt.example: His clothes were covered in dirt.

disable.root: dis-(不) + able(能力) -> 使失去能力

disappear.example: The magician made the rabbit disappear.

disappoint.root: dis-(不) + appoint(任命/安排) -> 约好却没成
disappoint.example: The movie didn't disappoint its fans.
disappoint.exampleCn: 这部电影没有让影迷失望。

disaster.root: dis-(不好的) + aster(星星) -> 星象不利
disaster.example: The flood was a natural disaster.

disc.example: Insert the disc into the player.

discard.root: dis-(去掉) + card(纸牌) -> 打出不要的牌
discard.exampleCn: 立即丢掉任何坏了的玩具。

discern.root: dis-(离) + cern(筛选) -> 筛分出真相
discern.example: It's hard to discern any difference.
discern.exampleCn: 很难辨别出有什么不同。

discernible.example: There is a discernible change in weather.
discernible.exampleCn: 天气有明显可辨的变化。

discharge.root: dis-(去掉) + charge(负担) -> 卸货/释放
discharge.example: The factory was told to stop discharge.
discharge.exampleCn: 工厂被责令停止排放废料。

discipline.root: 来自 discipulus (学生) -> 学生守则

disclose.root: dis-(不) + close(关) -> 不再关闭
disclose.example: He refused to disclose the source.

discount.root: dis-(去掉) + count(计算) -> 不算的部分

discourage.root: dis-(去掉) + courage(勇气) -> 使失去勇气

discover.root: dis-(去掉) + cover(盖子) -> 揭盖

discrete.root: dis-(离) + crete(分) -> 相互分开的
discrete.example: The data is divided into discrete units.
discrete.exampleCn: 数据被分成离散的单元。

discrimination.root: dis-(离) + crimin(分) -> 区别对待

discussion.root: dis-(分) + quatere(震) -> 拆解震荡/辩论
discussion.example: We had a long discussion about it.
discussion.exampleCn: 我们对此进行了长久的讨论。

disease.root: dis-(不) + ease(自在) -> 不舒服
disease.example: He is suffering from a rare disease.

disguise.root: dis-(变) + guise(外观) -> 改变外观
disguise.example: She wore a wig as a disguise.

disgust.root: dis-(不) + gust(味道) -> 不好的味道
disgust.example: The smell of the trash filled him with disgust.
disgust.exampleCn: 垃圾的味道让他感到极度恶心。

dish.example: This is my favorite Italian dish.
dish.exampleCn: 这是我最喜欢的意式菜肴。

dismiss.example: The judge decided to dismiss the case.

displace.root: dis-(离) + place(位置) -> 离开原有位置
displace.exampleCn: 洪水使许多家庭流离失所。

dispose.root: dis-(分) + pose(放) -> 分开放置/处置
dispose.example: Please dispose of your trash properly.

dispute.root: dis-(离) + pute(算) -> 各算各的/分歧
dispute.example: The two neighbors had a dispute.
dispute.exampleCn: 这两个邻居发生了纠纷。

disregard.exampleCn: 不用理会最后一条信息。

disrupt.root: dis-(离) + rupt(断) -> 撕断/破坏
disrupt.example: Protesters tried to disrupt the meeting.

disseminate.exampleCn: 互联网有助于传播信息。

dissertation.root: dis-(分) + sert(连接) -> 拆开详述
dissertation.example: She is writing her Ph.D. dissertation.
dissertation.exampleCn: 她正在写她的博士论文。

dissolve.root: dis-(离) + solve(松) -> 松散开/化掉
dissolve.example: Sugar will dissolve in hot tea.

eggplant.root: egg(蛋) + plant(植物) -> 像蛋一样的植物
eggplant.example: I am going to cook fried eggplant for dinner.
eggplant.exampleCn: 我打算晚饭做油炸茄子。

ego.root: ego(我) -> 只有自我，过于自大
ego.example: His success has really fed his ego.
ego.exampleCn: 他的成功让他变得非常自负。

el.example: We took the el to the downtown station.
el.exampleCn: 我们坐高架铁路去了市中心站。

elbow.root: el(臂) + bow(弯曲) -> 臂部弯曲处
elbow.example: She rested her elbows on the table.

elect.root: e-(出来) + lect(选) -> 选出来
elect.example: The citizens will elect a new president next month.
elect.exampleCn: 公民们下个月将选出一位新总统。

elective.example: Photography is an elective course in our school.
elective.exampleCn: 摄影是我们学校的一门选修课。

electron.example: An electron is a negatively charged particle.
electron.exampleCn: 电子是一种带负电的微粒。

electronics.example: The store sells all kinds of home electronics.
electronics.exampleCn: 这家商店出售各种家用电子设备。

elegance.root: e-(出来) + leg(选) -> 选出来的精品
elegance.example: She is admired for her natural elegance.
elegance.exampleCn: 她天生的优雅气质令人赞赏。

element.root: ele-(第一/开始) + -ment -> 最初的事物
element.example: Honesty is a vital element of a good relationship.
element.exampleCn: 诚实是良好关系中至关重要的要素。

elementary.example: He is studying elementary English grammar.
elementary.exampleCn: 他正在学习初级英语语法。

elephant.root: 来自希腊语 elephas -> 象
elephant.example: The elephant used its trunk to pick up the fruit.
elephant.exampleCn: 大象用象鼻卷起了水果。

elevator.root: e-(出来/上) + lev(举) -> 举上去的机器
elevator.example: The elevator is out of order today.

elicit.root: e-(出来) + lic(诱惑) -> 诱导出来
elicit.example: The teacher tried to elicit answers from the students.
elicit.exampleCn: 老师试图启发学生给出答案。

elite.root: e-(出来) + lite(选) -> 选拔出来的尖子
elite.example: They belong to the military elite.

eloquence.root: e-(出来) + loqu(说) -> 说得流畅有力
eloquence.exampleCn: 他的口才给观众留下了深刻印象。

embark.root: em-(进入) + bark(船) -> 上船开始航行
embark.example: The scientists are about to embark on a new research project.
embark.exampleCn: 科学家们即将着手一个新的研究项目。

embarrass.root: em-(进入) + barr(障碍) -> 陷入困境
embarrass.example: I didn't want to embarrass him in front of his friends.
embarrass.exampleCn: 我不想在他朋友面前让他难堪。

embellish.example: He decided to embellish his story with some funny details.
embellish.exampleCn: 他决定用一些有趣的细节来润色他的故事。

embroider.root: em-(在内) + broider(针刺) -> 在布上绣花
embroider.example: She learned how to embroider silk from her mother.
embroider.exampleCn: 她向母亲学习了如何在丝绸上刺绣。

embryo.root: em-(在内) + bry(生长) -> 在内部生长的
embryo.example: The idea for the book was still in embryo.
embryo.exampleCn: 这本书的构思还处于萌芽阶段。

emerge.root: e-(出来) + merge(沉/没) -> 从沉没中出来
emerge.example: The sun began to emerge from behind the clouds.
emerge.exampleCn: 太阳开始从云层后面露出来。

emergency.root: emerge(浮现) -> 突然冒出来的事
emergency.example: The pilot made an emergency landing.
emergency.exampleCn: 飞行员进行了紧急迫降。

emigrate.root: e-(出来) + migr(搬家) -> 搬到外面去
emigrate.example: His family chose to emigrate to Australia.
emigrate.exampleCn: 他的家人选择移居澳大利亚。

eminent.root: e-(出来) + min(伸出) -> 杰出突出的
eminent.example: He is an eminent professor of law.
eminent.exampleCn: 他是一位著名的法学教授。

emission.root: e-(出来) + miss(送) -> 送出来的东西
emission.example: The government aims to reduce carbon emissions.

emit.root: e-(出来) + mit(送) -> 送出来
emit.example: Fireflies emit a green glow in the dark.
emit.exampleCn: 萤火虫在黑暗中发出绿光。

emotion.root: e-(出来) + mot(动) -> 内心波动的表现
emotion.example: Anger is a natural human emotion.
emotion.exampleCn: 愤怒是人类的一种自然情感。

emperor.root: em-(在内) + per(准备/命令) -> 命令他人者
emperor.example: The emperor lived in a magnificent palace.
emperor.exampleCn: 皇帝居住在一座宏伟的宫殿里。

emphasise.root: em-(进入) + phas(显示) -> 使变得显眼
emphasise.example: I must emphasise the importance of regular exercise.
emphasise.exampleCn: 我必须强调定期锻炼的重要性。

empire.root: em-(在内) + pire(命令) -> 权力覆盖区
empire.example: The British Empire once spanned the globe.

empirical.root: em-(在内) + pir(试验) -> 在实践中学习
empirical.example: The theory is based on empirical evidence.
empirical.exampleCn: 该理论是建立在经验性证据之上的。

employ.root: em-(进入) + ploy(折叠/联系) -> 把人拉进圈子
employ.example: How many people does the factory employ?

enable.example: Computers enable us to process data quickly.
enable.exampleCn: 计算机使我们能够快速处理数据。

enact.root: en-(使) + act(行动) -> 使法律生效
enact.example: They hope to enact the new law by the end of the year.
enact.exampleCn: 他们希望在年底前颁布新法律。

enclose.root: en-(在内) + close(关) -> 关在里面
enclose.example: A high wall encloses the garden.

encounter.root: en-(在内) + counter(相反) -> 迎面碰上
encounter.example: I had a strange encounter with an old friend.
encounter.exampleCn: 我和一位老朋友有了一次奇怪的偶遇。

encourage.root: en-(使) + cour(心) -> 给人以勇气
encourage.example: My teacher always encourages me to study hard.
encourage.exampleCn: 我的老师总是鼓励我努力学习。

encyclopedia.root: en-(在内) + cyclo(圆/全) + pedia(教育) -> 全方位教育
encyclopedia.example: You can find information on any topic in the encyclopedia.
encyclopedia.exampleCn: 你可以在百科全书中找到任何主题的信息。

endanger.example: Pollution can endanger many sea animals.
endanger.exampleCn: 污染会危及许多海洋动物。

endow.root: en-(使) + dow(给) -> 给予某物
endow.example: The billionaire decided to endow a new scholarship.
endow.exampleCn: 这位亿万富翁决定资助一项新的奖学金。

endure.root: en-(使) + dur(持久) -> 使能坚持下去
endure.example: They had to endure the extreme heat of the desert.
endure.exampleCn: 他们不得不忍受沙漠的极端酷热。

enemy.root: en-(不) + emy(爱) -> 不爱的人
enemy.example: They have been enemies for many years.
enemy.exampleCn: 他们多年来一直是敌人。

energetic.example: She is an energetic person who loves outdoor sports.
energetic.exampleCn: 她是一个精力充沛、热爱户外运动的人。

energy.root: en-(在内) + erg(工作) -> 内部的工作力
energy.example: The kids are full of energy today.
energy.exampleCn: 孩子们今天精力非常旺盛。

enforce.root: en-(使) + force(力量) -> 用力执行
enforce.example: It is the job of the police to enforce the law.
enforce.exampleCn: 警察的工作就是执行法律。

engagement.root: en-(使) + gage(誓约) -> 做出正式承诺
engagement.example: They broke off their engagement after two months.
engagement.exampleCn: 两个月后他们解除了婚约。

engineer.root: engin(机器) + -eer(人) -> 专门修理/设计机器的人
engineer.example: He is a software engineer at a famous tech company.
engineer.exampleCn: 他是某知名科技公司的软件工程师。

engineering.example: Civil engineering is a popular major for students.
engineering.exampleCn: 土木工程是学生们的热门专业。

engrave.root: en-(在内) + grave(挖/切) -> 往里面切
engrave.example: They will engrave your initials on the watch.
engrave.exampleCn: 他们会把你的姓名首字母刻在手表上。

enhance.example: This new feature will enhance the user experience.
enhance.exampleCn: 这个新功能将提升用户体验。

enlarge.example: We need to enlarge this photo to frame it.
enlarge.exampleCn: 我们需要放大这张照片来装裱它。

enlighten.root: en-(使) + light(光) -> 使内心有光
enlighten.example: Can you enlighten me on the details of the project?
enlighten.exampleCn: 你能就这个项目的细节启发我一下吗？

enormity.root: e-(出来) + norm(标准) -> 超出标准
enormity.example: The enormity of the task overwhelmed the team.
enormity.exampleCn: 任务之巨让团队感到难以应付。

enrich.example: Reading books can enrich your vocabulary.
enrich.exampleCn: 读书可以丰富你的词汇量。

enrol.root: en-(进入) + rol(名单) -> 记入名册
enrol.example: You need to enrol for the course by Friday.
enrol.exampleCn: 你必须在周五前注册这门课程。

enter.example: Please enter your password to continue.

enterprise.root: enter-(进入) + prise(抓) -> 着手去抓/做
enterprise.example: Starting your own business is a risky enterprise.
enterprise.exampleCn: 自主创业是一项充满风险的事业。

enterprising.example: The enterprising girl started her own shop.
enterprising.exampleCn: 这个有进取心的女孩开了自己的店。

entertain.root: enter-(在内) + tain(握住) -> 使留连其中
entertain.example: The circus was here to entertain the children.
entertain.exampleCn: 马戏团在这里是为了娱乐孩子们。

enthusiastic.root: en-(在内) + thus(神) -> 内心有神助的狂热
enthusiastic.example: She is very enthusiastic about her new job.
enthusiastic.exampleCn: 她对自己的新工作充满热情。

entitle.root: en-(使) + title(头衔/题目) -> 给人名分
entitle.example: This ticket entitles you to a free meal.
entitle.exampleCn: 这张票让你有权享用一顿免费餐。

entity.example: The company is a legal entity separate from its owners.
entity.exampleCn: 公司是一个独立于其所有者的法律实体。

entrance.example: We waited at the entrance of the theater.
entrance.exampleCn: 我们在电影院入口处等候。

entry.example: They gained entry to the house through a window.
entry.exampleCn: 他们通过窗户进入了那所房子。

envelope.root: en-(进入) + velop(包裹) -> 包在里面的纸
envelope.example: Please put the letter in the envelope.

environment.root: en-(在内) + viron(圆/转) -> 绕在周围的
environment.example: Children need a safe environment to grow up in.
environment.exampleCn: 孩子们的成长需要一个安全的环境。

envy.root: en-(向内) + vy(看) -> 盯着看别人的东西
envy.example: I envy his ability to stay calm under pressure.
envy.exampleCn: 我羡慕他在压力下保持冷静的能力。

enzyme.root: en-(在内) + zyme(发酵) -> 起发酵作用的
enzyme.example: Saliva contains enzymes that start the digestion process.
enzyme.exampleCn: 唾液中含有启动消化过程的酶。

epic.root: epi-(说) -> 口口相传的宏大故事
epic.example: The movie was an epic tale of war and love.
epic.exampleCn: 这部电影是一个关于战争与爱情的壮丽故事。

epidemic.root: epi-(之上) + dem(人民) -> 降在人民头上的病
epidemic.example: There was a flu epidemic in the city last winter.
epidemic.exampleCn: 去年冬天城里发生过一次流感爆发。

equation.example: Can you solve this simple math equation?
equation.exampleCn: 你能解这个简单的数学等式吗？

equator.root: equ(平等) + -ator -> 把地球平分的线
equator.exampleCn: 印度尼西亚位于赤道上。

equip.root: 来自skip(船) -> 给船配齐器材
equip.example: The school aims to equip students with life skills.
equip.exampleCn: 学校旨在使学生具备生活技能。

equipment.example: The rescue team had all the necessary equipment.
equipment.exampleCn: 救援队拥有所有必要的设备。

equity.example: The manager treats all employees with equity.
equity.exampleCn: 经理公平地对待所有员工。

equivalent.example: Eight kilometers is roughly equivalent to five miles.
equivalent.exampleCn: 八公里大致相当于五英里。

era.root: 来自 aera -> 记账的数字/标志性时刻
era.example: The invention of the steam engine marked a new era.
era.exampleCn: 蒸汽机的发明标志着一个新时代的到来。

erase.root: e-(出来) + rase(刮/擦) -> 擦出去
erase.example: Please erase the writing from the board.

erection.root: e-(出来) + rect(直) -> 使竖直立起来
erection.example: The erection of the statue took several months.
erection.exampleCn: 塑像的竖立花了几个月时间。

erode.root: e-(出来) + rode(咬) -> 咬掉表面
erode.example: The sea is beginning to erode the cliffs.

error.example: There is an error in your calculation.
error.exampleCn: 你的计算中有一个错误。

erupt.root: e-(出来) + rupt(断/破) -> 破壳而出
erupt.example: The volcano is expected to erupt soon.
erupt.exampleCn: 预计火山很快就会喷发。

escalate.example: The minor argument began to escalate into a fight.
escalate.exampleCn: 小争吵开始升级为打斗。

escalator.example: The escalator is faster than the stairs.

escape.root: ex-(出来) + cape(斗篷) -> 脱掉斗篷逃跑
escape.example: The bird managed to escape from the cage.
escape.exampleCn: 鸟儿设法从笼子里逃走了。

essay.root: ex-(出来) + ag(称重/试) -> 尝试写出来
essay.example: She had to write a three-page essay.
essay.exampleCn: 她必须写一篇三页长的短文。

incentive.root: in-(在内) + cent(唱/响) -> 唱出激情/激励

incentive.exampleCn: 奖金起到了激励员工的作用。

incident.root: in-(在) + cid(落) -> 掉到身上的事
incident.example: She wrote a report about the incident.
incident.exampleCn: 她写了一份关于该事件的报告。

incidentally.example: Incidentally, I saw your brother today.
incidentally.exampleCn: 顺便说一下，我今天见到你哥哥了。

incline.root: in-(向内) + clin(弯曲) -> 心里弯向某处
incline.example: I incline to the view that he is right.
incline.exampleCn: 我倾向于认为他是对的。

increase.root: in-(在内) + cre(生长) -> 内部长多

increment.example: You will receive a salary increment next year.
increment.exampleCn: 明年你的工资会有所增长。

index.root: in-(向) + dex(指) -> 指示之物

index.exampleCn: 在索引中查找这个主题。

indian.example: She loves Indian food very much.

indifferent.root: in-(不) + different(区别) -> 觉得没区别/无所谓
indifferent.example: He seemed indifferent to my pain.
indifferent.exampleCn: 他似乎对我的痛苦漠不关心。

indigenous.root: indi-(内) + gen(生) + -ous -> 在本地生的

indignant.root: in-(不) + dign(值得/尊严) -> 觉得被不公对待

indignant.exampleCn: 她对遭受的待遇感到愤慨。

indignity.example: He had to suffer the indignity of being searched.
indignity.exampleCn: 他不得不忍受被搜身的侮辱。

indoor.exampleCn: 游泳是一项受欢迎的室内运动。

induce.root: in-(内) + duc(引导) -> 引诱进去

induce.exampleCn: 什么也不能诱使我去做那件事。

inductive.root: in-(内) + duct(引导) + -ive -> 由个别向内引导出结论

inductive.exampleCn: 他利用归纳推理解决了这个问题。

indulge.root: in-(内) + dulg(放纵) -> 纵情于内

industry.root: indu-(内) + stru(建) -> 内部构建/生产

inert.root: in-(不) + ert(艺术/活力) -> 没有活力的

inevitable.root: in-(不) + e-(外) + vit(避) -> 避不开的

infant.root: in-(不) + fa(说) -> 还不会说话的人

infection.root: in-(内) + fect(做) -> 做入内部/病菌侵入

infer.root: in-(内) + fer(带) -> 带入逻辑/推论

infer.exampleCn: 你能从这些证据中推断出什么？

inferior.root: infer(下面) + -ior(比较级) -> 处于下位的

inflation.exampleCn: 高通胀率是一个严重的问题。

inflection.root: in-(内) + flect(弯) -> 词尾或声调的弯曲变化
inflection.exampleCn: 他的声音没有抑扬顿挫。

influence.root: in-(入) + flu(流) -> 流入脑中/潜移默化

influence.exampleCn: 电视对孩子有很强的影响。

influential.example: His father is an influential politician.
influential.exampleCn: 他父亲是个有影响力的政治家。

influx.example: The city saw a massive influx of tourists.
influx.exampleCn: 这座城市涌入了大量的游客。

infrastructure.root: infra(下) + structure(结构) -> 底层架构

ingredient.exampleCn: 主要成分是面粉和鸡蛋。

inhabit.root: in-(内) + habit(居住) -> 住在里面

inhabit.exampleCn: 很少有人居住在这个偏远地区。

inhabitant.example: The inhabitants of the village are friendly.
inhabitant.exampleCn: 那个村庄的居民很友好。

inherent.root: in-(在内) + her(粘) -> 粘在里面的/天生的

inherit.root: in-(内) + her(继承人) -> 作为继承人入主

injection.root: in-(内) + ject(投射) -> 射入体内

injure.root: in-(不) + jur(法/权利) -> 侵害合法状态

injury.exampleCn: 他在撞车事故中逃过一劫，没有受伤。

ink.root: 来自 enkauston(烧入) -> 渗入纸张的液体

inner.root: in(在内) + -er(比较级) -> 较里面的

innovate.root: in-(内) + nov(新) -> 内部推陈出新

inquire.root: in-(内) + quire(追求/问) -> 追问

insane.root: in-(不) + sane(健全) -> 精神不健全

insert.root: in-(内) + sert(连接/放) -> 放入其中

insist.root: in-(上) + sist(站) -> 站在那不走/坚持

insomnia.root: in-(不) + somn(睡眠) + -ia(病) -> 无法入眠

inspect.root: in-(内) + spect(看) -> 往里面看/细看

inspire.root: in-(向内) + spire(呼吸) -> 吹入灵气

install.root: in-(内) + stall(位子) -> 放入位子

instance.root: in-(内) + st(站) -> 站在中间的情况

instant.root: in-(紧迫) + st(站) -> 站在跟前的/眼下的

instil.root: in-(内) + still(滴) -> 滴入/慢慢教导

instil.exampleCn: 父母向孩子灌输价值观。

institute.root: in-(内) + stit(立) -> 设立的机构

institution.example: The school is a famous educational institution.
institution.exampleCn: 该校是著名的教育机构。

instruct.root: in-(内) + struct(建) -> 在脑内构建知识

insult.root: in-(上) + sult(跳) -> 跳到别人头上/侮辱

insure.root: in-(使) + sure(确定) -> 使有保障

intake.exampleCn: 你应该减少盐的摄入量。

intelligence.root: intel(之间) + leg(挑) -> 辨别是非的能力

intensity.root: in-(在内) + tens(拉) -> 拉得很紧/强烈

interview.root: inter-(相互) + view(看) -> 相互看对方

landlady.example: The landlady came to collect the rent.

landmark.example: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark.

landscape.root: land(地) + scape(景) -> 地上的景色

lap.root: 来自古英语 læppa -> 边缘/折叠处

law.root: 来自 lay(放/建立) -> 被定下来的规则

league.root: leag-(捆绑/约束) -> 绑定在一起

leap.root: 来自古英语 hleapan -> 跳

learn.root: 来自古英语 leornian -> 追踪/获取知识

lease.root: 来自 relax(松开) -> 放出使用权

lick.root: 拟声词，模拟舌头接触声

lid.root: 来自古英语 hlid -> 覆盖物

liner.root: line(航线) + -er -> 跑固定航线的船

liquor.root: 与 liquid 同源 -> 液体/汁液

list.root: 来自古英语 list -> 条/边缘

litter.root: 来自 lect(铺盖/床) -> 乱铺的东西

loaf.root: 来自古英语 hlaf -> 面包

lobby.root: 来自中世纪拉丁语 laubia -> 走廊

lodge.root: 来自 log(圆木) -> 用木头盖的屋子

log.root: 来自古挪威语 lag -> 倒下的树/航海日志

longitude.root: long(长) + -itude -> 长度(沿地球纵向)

loom.root: 来自古英语 geloma(工具) -> 庞然大物

lord.root: 来自 hlaf(面包) + weard(守卫者) -> 面包的分发者

lotion.root: lot(洗) + -ion -> 用来洗/涂的东西

lovely.exampleCn: 我们度过了美好的一天。

lubricate.example: Oil is used to lubricate machines.

lucrative.example: This is a very lucrative business.

luggage.root: lug(拖/拉) + -age -> 拖着走的东西

lull.example: The sound of rain lulled me to sleep.

lump.root: 来自中世纪低地德语 lumpe -> 团/块

metabolism.root: meta-(改变) + bol-(扔/变) -> 物质转换

metabolism.exampleCn: 运动可以帮助加速你的新陈代谢。

meteorite.root: meteor(流星) + -ite(石) -> 掉下的陨石

method.root: meth-(按照) + od(路) -> 按照路径走

milk.example: Would you like some milk in your coffee?

hug.root: 可能源自斯堪的纳维亚语 -> 安抚/照看

human.root: hum-(泥土) -> 尘土捏成的人

jail.root: 来自 cavea -> 洞穴/笼子

jewel.root: 来自 jocale -> 玩具/玩物

job.root: 原指“一小块” -> 一份差事

joke.root: 来自拉丁语 jocus -> 游戏

journalist.example: He wants to be a professional journalist.

journey.example: It was a long and tiring journey.

keen.root: 来自古英语 cene -> 勇敢/大胆

vicious.exampleCn: 他遭到了一只恶狗的攻击。

victim.example: The victim of the robbery was unhurt.
victim.exampleCn: 抢劫案的受害者没有受伤。

victory.example: They celebrated their victory in the match.

view.example: There is a beautiful view from the hill.
view.exampleCn: 从山上可以看到美丽的风景。

viewpoint.root: view(看) + point(点) -> 看问题的立足点
viewpoint.example: From a business viewpoint, it's a good deal.
viewpoint.exampleCn: 从商业的角度看，这是个不错的交易。

vigorous.root: vig-(生命力) + orous -> 充满活力的
vigorous.example: He is a vigorous advocate of reform.
vigorous.exampleCn: 他是改革的有力倡导者。

villa.root: vill-(乡村住宅) -> 郊外住宅
villa.example: They spent their holiday in a villa by the sea.
villa.exampleCn: 他们在海边的一栋别墅里度假。

vine.root: vin-(酒) -> 酿酒的藤本植物
vine.example: The ivy vines covered the wall.

vinegar.root: vin-(酒) + egar(酸) -> 变酸了的酒
vinegar.example: I like to put vinegar on my salad.

violate.root: viol-(力量) -> 强力破坏规矩
violate.example: Do not violate the traffic rules.

violence.root: viol-(力量) + ence -> 强暴的行为
violence.example: The movie contains scenes of violence.
violence.exampleCn: 这部电影包含暴力场面。

violet.example: Her eyes are a deep shade of violet.
violet.exampleCn: 她的眼睛是深紫罗兰色的。

violin.root: 来自意大利语 -> 弦乐器
violin.example: She has been playing the violin since she was six.
violin.exampleCn: 她从六岁起就开始拉小提琴了。

virtue.root: vir-(男人) -> 男人的英雄气概/美德

virus.root: vir-(毒) -> 像毒液一样的微生物
virus.example: My computer has been infected by a virus.

visa.example: You need a visa to enter the country.
visa.exampleCn: 你需要签证才能进入该国。

visible.root: vis-(看) + ible -> 能被看到的
visible.example: The stars are clearly visible tonight.

vision.root: vis-(看) + ion -> 看到的能力/景象
vision.example: He has poor vision in his left eye.

visual.root: vis-(看) + ual -> 与视觉有关的
visual.example: Art is a visual form of expression.
visual.exampleCn: 艺术是一种视觉表达形式。

vitamin.root: vit-(生命) + amine(胺) -> 生命之胺
vitamin.example: Fruit is a good source of vitamins.
vitamin.exampleCn: 水果是维生素的良好来源。

vocabulary.root: voc-(叫/声) -> 叫出的各种词汇
vocabulary.example: Reading helps you improve your vocabulary.
vocabulary.exampleCn: 阅读能帮你扩大词汇量。

vocation.root: voc-(叫) -> 神的召唤/使命感
vocation.example: Teaching is a vocation for her.

vogue.root: vog-(波/流) -> 随波逐流/时尚
vogue.example: Short hair is in vogue again.

void.example: The contract was declared null and void.

volatile.root: vol-(飞) -> 容易飞走的/不稳定的
volatile.example: Petrol is a highly volatile liquid.
volatile.exampleCn: 汽油是一种极易挥发的液体。

volleyball.example: We played volleyball on the beach.

volt.root: 来自意大利物理学家 Volta

volume.root: vol-(卷) -> 古代卷轴/书籍/厚度
volume.example: Turn down the volume on the TV.

volunteer.root: vol-(意志/愿) -> 出于意愿做事的人
volunteer.example: She works as a volunteer for a charity.
volunteer.exampleCn: 她在一家慈善机构做志愿者。

vote.root: vot-(誓言) -> 庄严表达意向
vote.example: Don't forget to vote in the election.

voucher.root: vouch-(保证) -> 保证可以抵扣的凭证
voucher.example: He has a voucher for a free meal.

vow.root: vot-(承诺) -> 郑重许下诺言

vowel.example: The English vowels are a, e, i, o, u.
vowel.exampleCn: 英语元音字母有a, e, i, o, u。

voyage.example: The ship made a long voyage.
voyage.exampleCn: 船进行了一次长途航行。

vulgar.root: vulg-(平民) -> 通俗的/没教养的
vulgar.exampleCn: 他使用了一个粗俗的词语。

vulnerable.root: vuln-(伤口) + able -> 容易受伤的
vulnerable.example: Old people are vulnerable to the cold.

wagon.example: The horses pulled the heavy wagon.

waist.root: wax-(增长) -> 身体最宽阔/增长处
waist.example: The water was up to my waist.

wallet.example: He keeps his credit cards in his wallet.
wallet.exampleCn: 他把信用卡放在钱包里。

wander.example: We wandered around the old city.

wardrobe.root: ward(守卫) + robe(长袍) -> 存衣服的地方
wardrobe.example: She needs a new wardrobe for the job.
wardrobe.exampleCn: 她需要一套新衣服来应付工作。

warm.root: 来自原始印欧语 -> 产生热量的
warm.example: It's nice and warm in here.

warn.root: wer-(察觉) -> 使人注意到危险
warn.example: I warned him not to go.

waterfall.example: We hiked up to the waterfall.
waterfall.exampleCn: 我们徒步爬到了瀑布那儿。

wax.example: The candle wax dripped on the table.

wealth.root: weal(幸福/好) + th -> 过得好/有钱
wealth.exampleCn: 他拥有巨大的个人财富。

weapon.root: 来自原始日耳曼语 -> 战斗工具
weapon.example: The police found the murder weapon.

weary.example: He looked weary after the journey.
weary.exampleCn: 旅途结束后他看起来很疲倦。

weather.root: wed-(吹) -> 被风吹来的天气

weave.example: She learned to weave at school.

wedding.root: wed-(保证) -> 履行结婚盟誓
wedding.example: They invited us to their wedding.
wedding.exampleCn: 他们邀请我们参加他们的婚礼。

wedge.example: He used a wedge to split the wood.

weed.root: 来自古英语 -> 野生植物
weed.example: The garden is full of weeds.

weep.example: She began to weep with joy.

weird.root: wyrd-(命运) -> 像命运之神般超自然

welcome.root: well(好) + come(来) -> 很高兴你来

weld.example: They welded the broken parts together.
weld.exampleCn: 他们把断掉的零件焊在了一起。

welfare.root: well + fare(去) -> 走得好/生活好
welfare.example: The government is concerned with child welfare.

whale.root: 来自古英语 -> 巨大海兽
whale.example: We went out to sea to watch whales.

wheat.root: kweit-(白) -> 磨出来的白面粉
wheat.example: Wheat is grown in many parts of the world.
wheat.exampleCn: 世界许多地方都种植小麦。

whirl.example: The leaves whirled around in the wind.

whisky.example: He likes to drink whisky with ice.
whisky.exampleCn: 他喜欢喝加冰的威士忌。

whisper.root: 拟声词 -> 模仿细微的吐气声
whisper.example: She whispered the secret in my ear.
whisper.exampleCn: 她在我耳边低声说了那个秘密。

whistle.root: 拟声词 -> 模拟尖锐的哨声

wholesale.root: whole(整个) + sale(卖) -> 整批卖
wholesale.example: We buy the goods at wholesale prices.
wholesale.exampleCn: 我们以批发价购买这些商品。

wicked.root: wicca-(巫师) -> 像巫术一样坏的
wicked.example: The wicked witch in the story.
wicked.exampleCn: 故事里那个邪恶的女巫。

widow.root: widh-(分离) -> 与丈夫分离的人
widow.example: She has been a widow for ten years.

width.example: The bridge is only five meters in width.

wilderness.root: wild + deer + ness -> 野兽出没之地
wilderness.example: They got lost in the wilderness.

wildlife.example: The park is a sanctuary for wildlife.
wildlife.exampleCn: 公园是野生动物的避难所。

wipe.example: Wipe the table with a cloth.

wisdom.root: wis-(知道) + dom -> 知道的状态
wisdom.example: Experience is the mother of wisdom.

wish.root: wen-(追求/欲望) -> 心中所想
wish.example: I wish you a happy birthday.

wit.root: weid-(看到/知道) -> 反应快/聪明
wit.example: He is famous for his sharp wit.
wit.exampleCn: 他以其敏捷的才智而闻名。

withdraw.root: with-(向后) + draw(拉) -> 拉回来
withdraw.example: I need to withdraw some money from the bank.

wither.root: 来自 weather -> 受天气影响而枯干
wither.example: The flowers withered in the heat.

withstand.root: with-(反向/对着) + stand -> 对着站稳
withstand.example: The building can withstand strong winds.
withstand.exampleCn: 这栋建筑能经受住强风。

witness.root: wit-(知道) + ness -> 知道实情的人
witness.example: He was a witness to the accident.
witness.exampleCn: 他是那次事故的目击者。

wolf.root: 来自原始印欧语 -> 撕咬者
wolf.example: The pack of wolves hunted together.

womb.root: 来自古英语 -> 腹部/子宫
womb.example: The baby grows in the mother's womb.
womb.exampleCn: 婴儿在母亲的子宫里成长。

wooden.example: We have a wooden dining table.

wool.root: 来自原始印欧语 -> 软毛
wool.example: This sweater is made of pure wool.
wool.exampleCn: 这件毛衣是纯羊毛做的。

workaholic.root: work + alcoholic -> 像酗酒一样工作
workaholic.example: My father is a total workaholic.
workaholic.exampleCn: 我父亲是个十足的工作狂。

workforce.example: The company has a highly skilled workforce.
workforce.exampleCn: 公司拥有一支技术娴熟的员工队伍。

worm.root: wer-(转) -> 扭动爬行的虫子
worm.example: The early bird catches the worm.
worm.exampleCn: 捷足先登（早起的鸟儿有虫吃）。

worship.example: They go to the temple to worship.

worthy.exampleCn: 他是一个值得尊敬的对手。

wound.root: 源自古英语 wund -> 身体受损处
wound.example: The nurse cleaned the deep wound.
wound.exampleCn: 护士清洗了那个很深的伤口。

wrap.example: Please wrap the gift in red paper.
wrap.exampleCn: 请用红纸把礼物包起来。
